metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10022 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Xpdf 4.01.01. There is a NULL pointer dereference in the function Gfx::opSetExtGState in Gfx.cc.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-10022` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu3
libpoppler-cpp0v5 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu3
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu3
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu3
libpoppler111 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu3
poppler-utils - 0.76.1-0ubuntu3
No subscription required

notes.Note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 pfsmorigo> since there is not public repository, just a tarball, I analised the file in question (Gfx.cc) with the affected version and they seems the same mdeslaur> couldn't reproduce in poppler

criterions.comment: poppler package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.76.1-0ubuntu3').
xpdf package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
